Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, it's nice to finally put a face to the name! I've
heard a lot about you. You're the new farmer,
<MYNAME>, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm <BLUE>Raeger</BLUE>. I manage the restaurant here in
town. Feel free to drop by anytime for some
delicious eats!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning to you! Isn't it a little early to be
so jubilant? I'm a bit of a night owl, myself, so I
rather envy you for that.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Busy already?
Working hard is good, but there are limits. Be
sure to keep an eye on your health!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you look dead on your feet. Did
you not sleep well last night? You shouldn't stay
up too late, you know!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I just can't seem to think up a good recipe...
<MYNAME>, do you have any ideas?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. I'd love to talk with you for a
bit, if you have the time. We should really get to
know one another better, don't you think?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Eep! Oh, <MYNAME>... You startled me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm so sorry! My mind was elsewhere. How can I
help you?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello to you. Have you had dinner yet? You
should always make sure to fill your belly before
bed!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you done with your work for the day,
<MYNAME>? You should go to sleep early, then.
We both should, I think!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What brings you here so late at night? Hmm?
You came just to say good night?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ha ha. You're so courteous! All part of your
charm, I suppose...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Have you come
here just to see little old me? Well, I'm happy to
see you too!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. It's so nice to see
your face first thing in the morning! Gives me
the inspiration I need to work hard today.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Hmm? What's wrong? Why are you staring at
me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>What? I have bedhead?! Well...that's
embarrassing! Good of you to tell me, though.
Thanks!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you had lunch yet? You expend an awful
lot of energy in your work, so you've gotta make
sure you get plenty of calories each day!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Well, speak of the devil! Or...think of the devil,
I suppose. I was just thinking about you.
<PAGE>
Specifically, I was thinking how much I wanted
to see you...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
No matter how busy I may get, seeing you
always relaxes me. You're my oasis from the
harsh desert sun of daily existence.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've been awfully busy, so I've been...waiting
for a chance to talk to you. Have you finished
whatever it is you were doing?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If so, then let's chat a bit!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's dangerous to walk along the mountain paths
this late. You should go home before it gets
dark. I can escort you, if you'd like.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, how's the day's workload looking? Have you
been getting enough sleep? If not, maybe I can
sleep next to you, for encouragement...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hahaha. I'm just kidding! If I tried to sleep in the
same bed as you, I'd be so nervous I wouldn't
even be able to close my eyes!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
*yawn* Man, am I ever sleepy. I must not have
slept well last night. Every morning, it feels
harder and harder to get out of bed...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. ...What, no good
morning kiss? Well, if you won't give me one, I'll
just have to give you one instead!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Hey, you're supposed to close your eyes! But
it's kind of cute that you didn't. My wife is still
so sweet and innocent! Hee hee...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Let's both work
hard today. But...try not to push yourself TOO
hard, okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Were you busy this morning? You didn't say one
word to me. I thought maybe you'd forgotten all
about me!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, what should I make for lunch today?
Any requests, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You truly are a hard worker, you know that? If
you ever need help with anything, just let me
know.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. I know you're busy, but I have
to say, I feel a little let down that you didn't
come talk to me until now...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew. What a day! Same for you, I imagine.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When are you planning to go to sleep tonight?
Don't stay up too late, okay?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Am I worried about your health? Well, of
course. But I'm really just saying this because I'll
be lonely in that bed without you...

Content.VardId: 天気・季節ＭＳＧ（会話フラグOFFでしゃべる）

Content.Text:
<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a lovely day, isn't it? So warm and inviting...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
On rainy days like this, people don't ever come
to my restaurant. I should plan some sort of
event to draw crowds...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Phew, it's a hot one today. Especially in the
kitchen, where it's not just the food cooking, but
me too. I feel like I've been in a sauna.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
*sigh* I hate summer rain. It's so sticky and
humid, and makes food go bad so much more
quickly...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It generally gets cold when the wind starts to
blow, but it seems the sun has other ideas for
today...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you're out too much on a rainy day like this,
you're sure to catch a cold. I'm not saying you
should hole up indoors, but please do take care.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It certainly is cold today, isn't it? At least it's also
bright and sunny.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Whoa, your nose is bright red. Were you walking
around in the snow? Or did you run into
something, maybe?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so windy today, I feel like I could get blown
away! You should be careful out there yourself,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It sure has been snowing. I wonder when
Mother Nature will get tired of dropping her
dandruff on us! Guess I stay in until she does...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Doesn't this seem like the perfect day to stay
home and relax?
<PAGE>
I'm just afraid you'll get hurt out there, and the
mere thought of that breaks my heart...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's snowing like crazy... I sure hope the
restaurant'll make it through this okay.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <MYNAME>, how are things going with your
special someone? ...Oh, don't look so surprised!
You can't keep secrets like that around here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hahaha... Anyway, congratulations on getting
together. I hope you two have a long, happy
relationship!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong, <MYNAME>? Are you hungry?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I inherited this restaurant from my grandfather.
<PAGE>
The interior's all his original design. I haven't
touched it one bit. Looks great, though, doesn't
it?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, I can tell which farm is which just by
looking at them. I can! I mean, Fritz's is so
totally Fritz. I know just how he farms.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Be it ever so humble...well, actually, there are
plenty of places I'd rather be than home when
things get really busy!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I keep walking into town on this mountain trail
every day like you, I might finally toughen up a
bit!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since there are no landmarks around here, it's
hard to find your way around once it gets dark
out.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was thinking of going fishing in the river there.
Care to join me, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I locked eyes with a rabbit earlier, but it ran away
before I could get anywhere near it. They're very
cautious creatures, aren't they?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you work on a farm at the top of the mountain
like this, let's face it, you're gonna get hungry!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everything of Giorgio's is always so well-
organized. His house, his farmland...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...Fritz's, on the other hand, is a mess. It's hard
to believe they're both in the same profession!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Long ago, my grandfather rented a field on this
land and grew rice for his restaurant.
<PAGE>
Me, I've got my hands full just cooking...
<PAGE>
But one day, I hope to be able to cook a dish
with only my own carefully-selected ingredients,
just like my grandfather did.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0> has a real knack for tending
crops.
<PAGE>
It's kind of mesmerizing just to watch. That field
is like a work of fine art...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This morning, I happened to catch Elise's staff
checking the quality of her soil and the water
level in her paddies.
<PAGE>
They don't just grow crops willy-nilly, they put
real effort into it.
<PAGE>
That's why her produce is always such top-
quality stuff.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you know that the place where Elise's
mansion is standing now used to be all forest?
<PAGE>
I heard someone was building a house there,
then just a few days later, BOOM, there it was! A
mansion, in no time at all!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town sure is comfortable, isn't it? I moved
here when I was small, but I think it's just gotten
better with age.
<PAGE>
I'm always glad when people like you come here
to settle in and do some farm work. Makes this
already great place even better.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you eating enough? You should eat three
square meals a day, you know.
<PAGE>
...Maybe even from my restaurant! Hint, hint...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Klaus gave me an old vinyl record the other day.
<PAGE>
Hard to find things like that anymore, so I was
really excited to play it. Maybe I should bring it
into the restaurant sometime.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I have to wake up early every morning to prepare
food...but I'm not a morning person in the
slightest.
<PAGE>
I've conditioned myself to do it, but I think it's
worked a little too well. I wake up early even
when I don't have to, and just space out.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fritz is one friendly guy, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Maybe a little too friendly! And unlucky as can
be. But that's part of what makes him such a
character!
<PAGE>
Some people find him to be kind of annoying,
but he really is a good man. I hope you and he
can become fast friends.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
My cooking skills have been pretty stagnant ever
since I first opened the restaurant.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Someday, I hope to travel the globe to learn all
about foreign cuisines and techniques so I can
make my menu even better.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was small, I came here to live with my
grandfather. I was his foster kid, more or less.
<PAGE>
He's not around anymore, but I keep his memory
alive through his recipes and his restaurant.
<PAGE>
He entrusted all that to me, and I won't let him
down.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You sure are easy to talk to. Whenever I'm with
you, I just feel so at ease...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Are you...okay with our relationship the way it
is? ...I need to know how you feel.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>? What am I to you? Lately, it
just seems like...no, never mind. Forget I said
anything.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I don't know what to do. I'm so happy to be your
boyfriend, I just can't stop smiling! I'm afraid it'll
make my face explode...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seems my customers have heard rumors that
I've got a girlfriend now, and they keep asking
me what you're like.
<PAGE>
...But I felt I could never do you justice, so I just
kept my mouth shut.
<PAGE>
Does that make me petty?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do I...seem like I've let my guard down too
much when I'm talking with you?
<PAGE>
A customer told me that today. Said when I'm
talking with you, I smile really deeply...deeper
than I've ever smiled before.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you seem exhausted. You're
not...dieting or anything, are you? Because if
you are, you should stop.
<PAGE>
You're not fat...you need the calories...and,
well...I like watching you eat! You always look
so happy...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know I love you, <MYNAME>, right?
...Hmm? What's gotten into me?
<PAGE>
Well, I've...actually wanted to say that for a little
while now, but...I know you get embarrassed.
So I try not to say it TOO much. Hee hee.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I think I've been expecting a little too much from
you, <MYNAME>. I'm sorry about that.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm in a relationship with someone I truly
adore...so why does it hurt so much?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Are you happy you married me? ...You don't
seem very happy. I don't know, maybe it's just
my imagination...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I love spending all this time with you. I love
eating together with you. I'm so glad to have you
as my wife. Truly...it's my greatest joy.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know you're extremely busy, and I really don't
want you overworking yourself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I just love your cooking so much! So if you
could...would you cook for me every now and
again? Pleeeeeeeeease...?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Every time I wake up and see your face next to
mine, I'm reminded that I'm the luckiest man in
the world.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I love you, <MYNAME>. I'm so glad I married
you. I never could've imagined how wondrous
married life is.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I've never been so nervous on a date before. I
feel like I'm in junior high school again, and the
girl I like actually likes me back!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I had a lot of fun on our date. So much that I
don't think I'll ever forget this feeling, for as long
as I live...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't believe we're together like this again. It's
like some beautiful dream.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It took so much energy to try forgetting
about...well, us. But now I can use that energy
to help bring us closer than ever before!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm looking forward to seeing you in a wedding
dress. I'm sure you'll be the most beautiful bride
in the whole world.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
We're going to live together as a couple from
now on, right? I'm still having trouble accepting
this as reality. It's too perfect!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I still can't believe you've got a baby on the way.
I wonder if it'll be a boy or a girl... Either way,
I'm certain it'll be cute as a button!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is the baby kicking? Can it...hear me, I wonder?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Just about due, huh? I think I might be as
nervous as you are. Which...really doesn't say
much about me, does it?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I had no idea babies could be so cute. Maybe
we parents just see our children through special
goggles that make them look perfect to us...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that our children are crawling, we need to
watch them more closely so they don't get hurt.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The kids seem to be really interested in our jobs.
<PAGE>
I wonder if they'll grow up to be farmers too...or
chefs...or maybe they'll surprise us with
something altogether unexpected...

Content.VardId: プレイヤーが渡した、見せたＭＳＧ

Content.Text:
<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You brought this for me? Wow, this is my
absolute favorite! Thank you so much,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, hey, I'm a big fan of those. Thanks!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, now, this is something I like, for sure. Did
you bring it for me? Thank you very much.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? Thanks.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, uh... I'll take it. Thanks. Though...not to
sound ungrateful, but would you...mind not
giving me any more of these in the future?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm...really not a fan...but I'll take it, as I am
most grateful for the thought.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>...Wow, really? I'm sorry. But I...really can't
stand those. I'll still take it, but just this once.
No more, please!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks. I've always enjoyed these. And this one's
gold, even! It's very kind of you to give me such
a lovely gift.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, my! Is that gold? And it's...for me?! Are you
sure? ...Thank you so much!
Let's...not give any presents right now.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? ...I'm not sure I'm comfortable
accepting it right now. I'm sorry.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...You know, it's been forever since we last
talked, so I thought you were trying to make up
for lost time...
<PAGE>
But then you just thrust a gift at me and hope,
what, that I'll stay sweet on you and forget how
you've ignored me? Well, thanks, but no thanks.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Hey. Isn't there anything you want to say to
me, before handing over presents?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If you don't understand what I'm getting at,
that's fine. Hopefully, you will. But until
then...put that away. I don't want it.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I appreciate the thought, but I simply don't have
room for all these presents. I think you should
keep that one.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I already know how you feel about me. You don't
have to shower me with gifts. I'm happy enough
just knowing that you care. But thank you!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha. We may be married, but I can't bear to
take so many gifts from you in one day. Thank
you for the lovely thought, though!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>I never expected to receive something so nice
for my birthday!
<PAGE>
Wasn't it difficult to conjure up something so
uncommon? Thank you so much, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? A birthday present, for me? And it's...my
favorite...! I can't believe you put so much
thought into this!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm so flattered. Thank you so very, very much,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, hey. I'm a fan of these. ...Huh? It's a
birthday present for me? Wow, thanks! That's
really kind of you!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What's this? ...Oh, it's a birthday present!
Aww, you remembered!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm? You brought me a birthday present?
Oh...okay. Thanks!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
So THIS is what you're giving me for my
birthday? ...Well, okay. It's the thought that
counts. I'll take it.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>I can't believe you'd give me this for my
birthday...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I do appreciate the thought, but...I really can't
stand these. Sorry to say this, but if I see
anything like this again, it'd be too soon.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's so lovely to receive something so shiny and
beautiful for my birthday. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You remembered my birthday?! Thank you so
much! And you even brought me a shiny
present... It's stunning!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where did you catch that rabbit? You really
shouldn't be leading the poor thing around like
that. It looks so panicked!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When I was a kid, my grandfather used to tell
me that these little guys could shapeshift into
humans. Oh, to be young and naive again...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How in the world did you manage to catch an
ermine? They move so fast!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a rare animal, isn't it? Hmmm... This is
the first time I've ever seen one of these up
close. It certainly does have a cute face!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Oh, is that a real penguin?! It was so still, I
thought it was a stuffed animal!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Each monkey has its own territory, right?
Probably best not to drag them around too
much...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a cute parrot! Such an expressive face...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Surprised the little guy isn't making a fuss, being
held like that. Is it just that easy-going, or does
it just...like being held by you?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aside from being fluffier, how do Angora rabbits
differ from ordinary rabbits?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, I never realized before just how small
chicks are. That thing's so tiny, I'm afraid I might
accidentally crush it if it walks near my feet!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a good girl. Grow big and produce
delicious eggs, now, okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Small dogs are supposed to be really yappy,
aren't they? This one doesn't bark much at all,
though...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Whoa, this dog is definitely overweight. Are
you just letting it eat whatever it wants?
<PAGE>
Just like people, animals will get fat pretty
quickly if you don't pay attention to their diets.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a good little buddy. Are you listening to
what <MYNAME> tells you to do?
<PAGE>
<MYNAME> sometimes works much too hard,
so you need to help keep your master in check,
okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Whoa, this dog is definitely overweight. You
should put it on a diet and give it some exercise
before it gets even fatter.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Cats sure are cute, aren't they? If I have to
choose between a dog or a cat, I'll pick the cat
every time.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Well, now, you're a plump one! Though
it's...actually kind of cute on you. But still! For
health's sake, you need to lose some of that.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This cat has so much fur, I fear it's going to get
too hot during the spring and summer. It'll do
great in winter, though, for sure!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This cat is so fat, you can tell easily, even
through its long fur. You need to pay better
attention to its diet.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, today's the Flower Fair, huh? I guess that's
why people have been giving me flowers all day.
Well, thanks, <MYNAME>! It's a lovely gesture.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I've gotten a lot of flowers today, but it's yours
that's made me the happiest.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're still giving me a flower, even though we're
already married? You're so devoted! I'm a very
lucky man to have such a loving wife.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A present for Valentine's Day, huh? Thanks,
<MYNAME>! ...I sure have gotten a lot of
chocolate today...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Well, that's a relief. I was worried you might
not give me any sweets today!
<PAGE>
See, I wanted to accept your gift first, for good
luck, so I've been turning down everyone else.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Veronica laughed at me and said I was too
devoted...but I can't help it! I am. I'm utterly
devoted to you...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Thank you. You've shown me such loving
gratitude, even though we're already married.
You're such a perfect wife!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a beautiful feather. What were you
planning to do with it?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I deeply value our relationship, so let's make sure
we think about marriage very carefully, okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R>Is that...?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>...Oh, my. That was a lot louder than I meant it
to be. H-how about we go somewhere quiet to
talk about this?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You don't have to show that off all the time, you
know. It's...embarrassing...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Are you checking to see if I still love you? You
don't need to. The answer will always be yes,
until the very end of time!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...Is it true you've been flashing that blue feather
around?
<PAGE>
I'm sure you're just casually showing it off, but
you never know how others might take it. So it
might be best if you...not do that.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a nice ring. Do you like rings
and...accessories, and such?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This ring...is for me...? So, wait, are you
asking...? H-hold on a sec! Let's go somewhere
quiet and talk about this!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hmm? Oh, the ring? I always keep it with me.
It's proof of our relationship! How could I bear
not to have it?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That sure takes me back. It reminds me of the
good old days...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...So, is it true you've been showing your ring
around town?
<PAGE>
I'm sure you're just casually showing it off, but
you never know how others might take it. So it
might be best if you...not do that.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you wrap this present yourself? The ribbon
is really pretty. Such a nice color! I almost hate
to open it and spoil the beautiful presentation.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you wrap this yourself? I love opening
presents with proper wrapping like this. It makes
the whole thing so much more exciting!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, today's your birthday, right? This is
from me. I hope you like it.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>! May you never
change...except to smile and feel better
whenever you're sad, of course!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>! ...Hey, are you free
tonight?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I want to give you a proper celebration,
so...please wait for me at home, if you would!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, your stomach's growling. If you're
hungry, here...take this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>No, seriously, take it! I was going to give it to
you in the first place.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, I brought you a snack. Since you're
always working hard, I wanted to help keep your
energy up. I hope you like it!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, take this, okay? It's not much, but
it should help ease your hunger, at the very
least. You need a break every now and again!

Content.VardId: 会話間隔が空いていたＭＳＧ

Content.Text:
<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Long time no see, <MYNAME>. How have you
been?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Long time no see...is something that should
never be said by two people in a committed
relationship!
<PAGE>
I know you're busy with work, and I am too, but
man, it's just crazy how long it's been since
we've had a chance to catch up...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, am I...invisible to you or
something?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If not, then why won't you talk to me? I mean,
we're living under the same roof! If you're angry
with me, won't you please tell me why?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I find any rare animals, I'll let you know. And I
want you to do the same. We'll cover more
ground if we're both looking separately.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, no, I forgot to bring feed for the
animals...and I wanted to see them eating it,
too! Now I'm sad...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder what kind of fish there are in the lake.
Will we be able to catch different varieties than
what's in the river?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That jumpsuit looks pretty comfortable to move
around in, and is nice and bright. Just looking at
it makes me happy!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a nice outfit! It looks really good on
you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like that yellow scarf. It goes well with the red
jacket.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That red hoodie looks really good on you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love the colors and the overall design of that
checkered vest. Where did you buy it?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a nice outfit! They say yellow is a color
that cheers people up.
<PAGE>
And it might just be true. I mean, I definitely feel
happier now than I did before!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I like your outfit. You have really good taste!
It's darker-toned, but looks absolutely perfect on
you. Where did you buy it?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's a nice outfit. The color is fantastic,
and the design is totally "in"!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, I like that down jacket! I wouldn't mind
owning something like that myself...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Those clothes fit you perfectly. Though really,
you look great in anything!
<PAGE>
I, on the other hand, have to choose what to
wear very carefully, so I kind of envy you...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what are you wearing? That looks
amazing on you!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That yellow hoodie is so snazzy. Looks
comfortable, too! I really like this look on you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's a really nice sweater! I like both the
color and the pattern.
<PAGE>
It seems like the sort of thing that would go
great with anything!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a cute dress! I love the polka-dot
look on you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That outfit looks really comfortable, and gives
you a nice, casual look. I like it, I like it!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like your outfit. It looks good on you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What's with that look? You weren't hired
on as a chef while my back was turned...were
you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It looks good on you, though! And if you ever
really do want to be a chef, I'll be glad to hire
you. You've got the skills for the job!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, look at you, ninja! I mean...what? Who's
there?! Is there somebody here with me?! Heh
heh...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Never knew ninja garb came in red. I've only ever
seen darker colors, like black and blue.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But red looks pretty stylish! I like it. And it suits
you to a T!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, look at you, ninja! I mean...what? Who's
there?! Is there somebody here with me?! Heh
heh...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Never knew ninja garb came in yellow. I've only
ever seen darker colors, like black and blue.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I like the yellow even better! And it suits you
to a T.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's a really pretty outfit, but where in
the world did you find a cheongsam?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Huh? You think I should wear one too?! No,
nonono, that's quite all right! I don't think
anybody wants to see that...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Huh-uh, nothin' doin'! Ask till you're blue in the
face, the answer will still be no. Non-negotiable!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That sort of sophisticated outfit really suits you.
If you told a stranger you were the butler of the
house, I'm quite certain they'd believe it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...And the red color just makes it seem like
you're a high-ranking butler or something!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, that's an interesting hat you've got
on. Oh, you can use it as an umbrella? Well,
that's certainly handy!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Miniature hats are tricky to work with,
considering their size and the inherent difficulty
in finding any clothes to wear with them...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But somehow, that yellow mini hat really looks
good on you!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That hat looks good on you. It makes you look
the part of the master farmer.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...<MYNAME>, I have an uncontrollable urge to
stroke your head when I see you wearing that.
<PAGE>
I mean, they're dog ears! When you see animal
ears, don't you just feel obligated to pet them?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That chef's hat you've got on looks an awful lot
like what I saw a customer wearing in the
restaurant the other day.
<PAGE>
...Then again, it is a chef's hat, and they all look
pretty much the same, so maybe I'm just
overthinking things...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those headphones... What kind of music are
you listening to?
<PAGE>
I really enjoy music, so if you have any
recommendations for me, I'd love to hear them.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Since when have you worn glasses...?
Oh, are those fakes?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I guess yellow frames aren't too common on the
real deal. But they sure do look good on you!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Since when have you worn glasses...?
Oh, are those fakes?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I guess yellow frames aren't too common on the
real deal. But they sure do look good on you!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Since when have you worn glasses...?
Oh, are those fakes?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I guess yellow frames aren't too common on the
real deal. But they sure do look good on you!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please don't come into my kitchen. If you want
to order something, I'll take care of you at the
counter.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please don't enter my kitchen. I don't like to mix
business with personal affairs. Not even for you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...Hmm, this is...the legendary curry...that's
been stewing for 2000 years... Ugh, it tastes
terrible...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't feel so good today. Can we talk some
other time?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Sorry, I think I caught a cold. I'd feel terrible if
you got sick too, so you might want to keep
your distance from me today.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry, but I feel absolutely terrible right now.
I'm not really up for talking, and would prefer to
be left alone, if it's all the same.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's kind of...past my bedtime right now, so
would you mind going home? I don't mean to
be rude, but I really need my sleep.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. How long are you going to
stay up? Come on, we should both get some
sleep.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, would you like me to wake up early
tomorrow and gather some materials for you?
Yes, please.
No, thank you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You sure? Okay, then.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Got it. You sleep in tomorrow, then, and I'll
wake you up when I get home. Sound good?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I picked up some goodies for you. You should
find <ITEMNAME0> x <MOJI0> in your bag
now.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmm? You want some of this too? ...You're
drooling, you know.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are you staring at me? ...Oh, have you not
had anything to eat yet? Okay, you get one bite!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Huh? ...You want me to feed you? Seriously?!
You can eat by yourself, you know! Geez...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>All right, I'll do it. But I hope you realize how
much of a hopeless romantic this makes you!
...Here, say "ahhhh."

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Doesn't this bench look really great in yellow? I
feel energized just sitting on it!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice-looking pot. Seems like it could
store a lot of food, and its color scheme is
perfect to stimulate people's appetites.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Paper lanterns make everything they shine upon
seem mysterious, don't they? I want one for my
house, but I'm not sure it would suit my decor...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a perfectly-shaped, ergonomically-
designed table this is. And it looks great, to
boot!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This has a really exotic feel to it. Makes me feel
like I should drink green tea and eat dumplings
here. Maybe I should try it! Mmmmm...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This parasol table certainly does add an extra
little touch of class to the garden as a whole,
don't you think?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Parasols from the East sure have a unique
presence, don't they? They're so uncommon
around here, I just can't stop staring...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This kind of statue always has a story behind it.
<PAGE>
Maybe a valiant hero once slayed a fearsome
beast with this spear! You just...never know.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This kind of statue always has a story behind it.
<PAGE>
Maybe a valiant hero once protected his loved
one with this shield, and the two went on to live
happily ever after...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I lean too far forward, I'm afraid I might fall in.
How deep is the water, anyway?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I understand the tradition correctly, you make
a wish on the Daruma, draw one eye, then draw
the second if the wish comes true, right?
<PAGE>
But this Daruma has both its eyes drawn in
already, so...is this a used model or something?
I don't get it...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The shape of a kiln is designed to keep heat
contained within, right?
<PAGE>
I'll bet you could bake a pretty spectacular pizza
in one.
<PAGE>
It would heat evenly and quickly, and most likely
come out crispy and delicious as can be!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This kind of statue always has a story behind it.
<PAGE>
Maybe a valiant hero once slayed a fearsome
beast with this spear! You just...never know.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This kind of statue always has a story behind it.
<PAGE>
Maybe a valiant hero once protected his loved
one with this shield, and the two went on to live
happily ever after...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a beautiful tree. It twinkles with a golden
glow, like a star...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think this is modeled after a building that
actually exists -- though the real one is much
bigger, of course! I'd love to see it someday.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This castle is exceptionally well-made. I don't
know if it's based on a real one, but if it is, I'm
betting it's accurate down to the last detail.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you put your ingredients into bamboo, they'll
cook beautifully and smell amazing...so could I
get maybe one shoot? ...Er, never mind...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This obelisk looks impressive. But what was it
built for?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are some letters carved into this stone
marker, but I can't read them at all... Can you?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm always fascinated by the design of the
mechanical lion. I really admire whoever came
up with it, as it's just so creative!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, when I was a kid, I used to watch the
show this robot's from all the time. Seeing this
guy again sure brings back memories...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a lovely potted sunflower. Sunflowers are
my favorite, you know!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a beautiful flowerbed. Sunflowers are my
favorite, you know!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you love how maidenhair changes its
color? When it's planted in a flowerbed, I don't
need to clean up fallen leaves.
<PAGE>
So it's kind of like the perfect decoration, huh?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a charming basket. The vivid colors really
speak to me.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Quite an impressive topiary. But why is it shaped
like a mammoth...?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you love how maidenhair changes its
color? I just hate having to clean up all the fallen
leaves, though...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This tricycle is decorated so well, and the
flowers don't seem to be interfering with any of
its moving parts.
<PAGE>
Kinda makes you want to take it out and see if
you can still ride it, huh?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, a yellow fence. Yellow is my favorite color,
you know!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There's a lot of yellow in use here. Makes me
happy just looking around!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm... Whenever I'm here, I get hungry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Must be all the red. Red makes people hungry,
after all! Or so they say...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This whole area is really stylish.
<PAGE>
I could kill hours here just looking around, I
think.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I really like the atmosphere around here. It
feels...autumnal. And it's just so comfortable, I
never want to leave!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are so many snow sculptures here, it's
almost overwhelming. It can't be easy to make
things like these...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Looks like a good spot for a tea party. Maybe I
should bring some Eastern sweets and green tea
next time, for a real taste of exotic lands!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whenever I look at what Silk Country produces,
it inspires me to make new clothes of my own.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cabin Country has a great selection of dairy
products. I guess it's because their land is
perfectly suited to grazing...or so I hear.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I just love seeing the sorts of creative new things
Sakura Country is producing. It inspires me to
come up with new ideas of my own!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wheat Country has all kinds of grains. I guess
they're pretty well-named!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Rose Country, huh? Giorgio would go nuts in a
place like that.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tropical Country's products are all incredibly
tempting. I want them all! Whenever I'm
browsing their wares, time flies sooooo fast...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hard to believe Ice Country can find a reason to
come all the way out here. They must think
pretty highly of us!
<PAGE>
Their transportation options are so limited, I
can't imagine why else they'd even bother.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You've left your mark on almost every field in
town, haven't you? That's pretty incredible,
<MYNAME>. You really are a master farmer!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've got a lot of land contracted to you in
town, don't you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Well, the crops you raise are pretty much top
quality, so I wouldn't mind contracting out some
land to you myself!

Content.VardId: 町の発展MSG　//特定住人専用会話

Content.Text:
<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you met the newcomer yet? Came to my
house to greet me this morning. It's always really
nice having someone new in town, isn't it?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since more and more traders have been coming
to town, I've been able to broaden my horizons
and gather up all sorts of exotic ingredients.
<PAGE>
I never thought this town would become so
internationally renowned, nor boast such a
diverse culture.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Doesn't it feel weird to be able to buy something
so easily that you wouldn't have been able to
track down in a million years before?
<PAGE>
That's the beauty of international trade, and it
makes me so excited to see how famous this
town's become.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
If we can get more traders to come by, I might
be able to expand my menu with foreign dishes
that would be impossible to prepare now...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Our Trade Depot is so big, yet we really don't get
many traders around here. It's kind of a shame,
really.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A customer who came in the other day seemed
really shocked that my restaurant, and this town
in general, aren't more well-known.
<PAGE>
I'm not sure my restaurant really deserved all that
praise, but I do agree that this town has a lot
more to offer than people give it credit for.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town owes its renown almost entirely to
you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>As someone who's been living here for a long
time, allow me to thank you for all the great
work you've done. You make us look good!

Content.VardId: 町ブラ専用MSG　//モブ専用会話
メイド、下僕用MSG　//モブ専用会話

Content.Text:
<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, do you remember what day it is?
<PAGE>
I feel like something really spectacular might
happen when you get home, <MYNAME>...the
second you open that front door.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So don't stay out too late, okay?
